mapper.select: select distinct ms.id,ms.name,ms.name_en,ms.longitude,ms.latitude,ms.coordinate_x,ms.coordinate_y,ms.if_transfer,ms.station_status from line_station ls left join metro_station ms on ls.station_id=ms.id where ls.line_id=#{lineId} order by ls.order_num ASC
mapper.insert: insert ignore into line_station values(#{id},#{lineId},#{stationId},#{orderNum}) on duplicate key update line_id=#{lineId},station_id=#{stationId},order_num=IF(NULL,#{orderNum},VALUES(order_num))
